featureType.name: improved_spring
featureType.title: improved_spring
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: improved_spring
virtualTable.sql: SELECT a.wsf_code , a.wsf_type , a.wsf_name , a.altitude , a.serv_area_villages , a.serv_popu_personals , a.serv_popu_households , a.type_water_source , a.no_water_source , a.hand_pump_type_name , a.year_construction , a.fund , b.code as statuscode , b.status , a.observation , a.geom FROM waterfacilities a INNER JOIN status b ON a.status = b.code WHERE a.wsf_type = 'Improved Spring'
